document.full_text: andy murray played with fire before overcoming argentine juan ignacio chela 7-6 7-5 6-2 to reach the french open semi-finals for the first time on wednesday.
document.title: murray advances into maiden paris semi-final
lines_and_colors: andy murray played with fire before overcoming argentine juan ignacio chela 7-6 7-5 6-2 to reach the french open semi-finals for the first time on wednesday.
